overview:
Described in a Harvard Business School case (N9-806-046) as “a global marketing pioneer, business builder and change leader”, Mr. O’Dea is a recognized strategic advisor, marketing expert and entrepreneur with a track record that crosses virtually all major market categories worldwide.

He has advised top management clients in such companies as IBM, Microsoft, Shell, Samsung, Lenovo, Boeing, Compaq, Ford, Jaguar, Fujitsu, AT&T, PepsiCo, Kraft and Unilever. He also lived 12 years of his career overseas. Prior to co-founding AllianceHPL, Mr. O’Dea managed some of the world’s top marketing & communications firms. His resume includes: President, Foote, Cone and Belding Worldwide; Vice Chairman/Global Operations and CEO/Europe-Middle East-Africa, Bozell Worldwide; President, Ogilvy & Mather Worldwide Client Services.

Mr. O’Dea Board Chairman of Outword Bound International from 2003 to 2009 and currently serves on the board as chairman emeritus. Educated in the U.S. and Europe, Mr. O’Dea received a Global MBA With Honors from Thunderbird School of Global Management, the #1 ranked international graduate school, where he currently serves as Chairman of the Board of Trustees
